attributes.action: In "quiet" designated  train carriages stop all announcements
attributes.additional_details: There are far too many unnecessary and repetitive renouncement on trains. This is annoying for daily commuters,  I suggest a compromise; stop these announcements in carriages that are designated as quiet.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the individual train operating companies.  If you want the Government to make this a stipulation of franchise agreements, you may wish to resubmit your petition making this clear.
